name: Straight Down
description:
Description

Collect all the gems in the deep caves and reach the lowest point possible while avoiding lava and solving puzzles!

Controls
  • "A - D" Move left and right
  • "S" Mine
  • "Space" Jump
  • "E" Interact
  • "R" Restart Level

Thanks for playing!

Feedback is really helpful so feel free to leave a comment!
